package.name: Miragedesign_Pinterest
package.summary: A Pinterest Magento linker that allows you to interact with Pinterest from your Magento back office. It adds "Pin It" button to your product page with several options, also support you get Pinterest Feeds!
package.description:
A Pinterest Magento linker that allows you to add "Pin It" button to your product page.
Features:
1. Provide Horizontal, vertical pin count or button only layout.
2. Uses Product Name for the Pin Description.
3. Provide an option allows you to display Price or Special Price with the Description. Auto-detect current currency to use for Price, for example $
4. Support you to define the precision of price (how many decimal places for product prices)
5. Uses the Products Base Image for the Pin image.
6. Support you to config the width of the product image that will be displayed in Pin. The height of the image will vary based on the width automatically.
7. Pin the Product URL
8. Support locate file (currently only English, but other languages will be available soon)
9. Allow you to enable / disable the extension.
10. Allow user to use Pin It with other social network buttons like Facebook, Twitter, Google+, LinkedIn and Digg
11. Support vertical scrollbar layout for sharing buttons
12. Support you to show Pinterest Feeds on your site with several options
13. Support Open-Graph tags for full social support in all your product pages
14. Support you to show Pinterest Fanbox on your site with several options
And much more features are comming!
Version Status: 1.1.4, Stable

Developped by Mirage Design
Feel free to ask any question at our site
